# Are you interested in joining the City Council?

News Release Date

02-23-2024

[Back to News](https://www.cityoftalent.org/news)

Applications are now open for City Council Seat 6, be a part of shaping the future of the City of Talent as the newest City Council member!

The City of Talent is seeking applicants for an open City Council position. Normally, councilors are elected by voters, but in cases of unexpected vacancies, the current City Council appoints new members.

To quality, candidates must meet the following criteria:

1. Be a resident of Talent
2. Be a registered voter

**To apply, submit an application to the City Recorder in-person or via email** [cityrecorder@cityoftalent.org](mailto:cityrecorder@cityoftalent.org) **by 5:00 p.m. on Wednesday, March 13th, 2024. Applications are available \[here] or at Talent City Hall or online at [www.cityoftalent.org](https://www.cityoftalent.org).**

Candidate interviews will take place during the City Council's regular meeting on Wednesday, March 20th, April 3rd, 2024, at 6:45 p.m.

For more information, contact the City Recorder at (541) 535-1566 x6 or email [cityrecorder@cityoftalent.org](mailto:cityrecorder@cityoftalent.org).

\[Documents]

- Press Release: City Council Vacancy
- Application for City Council
